_meanings:
{@--2@} To come out of, flow or
issue from, drop, trickle or stream
forth from; {#svataScayutaM vahnimivAdBiraMbudaH#}
<ls>R. 3. 58</ls>; <ls>Bk. 9. 71.</ls>

{@--3@} To deviate
or swerve from, fall off or away
from, leave (duty &c.); (with <ab>abl.</ab>)
{#asmAdDarmAnna cyaveta#} <ls>Ms. 7. 98</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">12. 71-72</ls>.

{@--4@} To lose, be deprived of;
{#acyozwa sattvAnnfpatiH#} <ls>Bk. 3. 20</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">7. 92.</ls>

{@--5@} To vanish, disappear, perish, be
at an end; <ls>R. 8. 66</ls>; <ls>Ms. 12. 96.</ls>

{@--7@} To bring about,
make, form, create.

{@--8@} To cause to go
away, cause to forget.

{@--1@} To cause to move, excite, 
agitate.

{@--2@} (<ab>A.</ab>) To move oneself, be
shaken or moved.
